title: Stade Sous-Ville
text: Stade Sous-Ville is a <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Baulmes">Baulmes</a>, <a href="Switzerland">Switzerland</a>. It is the home ground of <a href="FC%20Baulmes">FC Baulmes</a> and has a capacity of 2,500. The <a href="stadium">stadium</a> has 500 seats and 2,000 standing places.
